content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Steam Power Generation System (Boiler Zone) at (8.0, 20.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Boiler at (8.0, 20.5) (Status: NO_FUEL; Warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid box now contains water – 200 units at 15°)
• Steam Engine at (0.5, 9.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"])
• Steam Engine at (1.5, 13.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"])
• Steam Engine at (11.5, 18.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: ["no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; Energy updated to ~10333.33)
• Steam Engine at (13.5, 14.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"])
• Steam Engine at (19.5, 14.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"])
• Steam Engine at (22.5, 18.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"])
• Steam Engine at (17.5, 20.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"])
• Steam Engine at (12.5, 21.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"])
• Steam Engine at (4.5, 23.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"])

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (-15.0, -50.0)

• Burner Inserter at (-14.5, -52.5) (Status: NO_FUEL; Warnings: ["out of fuel"])
• Burner Inserter at (-13.5, -52.5) (Status: NO_FUEL; Warnings: ["out of fuel"])
• Burner Inserter at (-11.5, -48.5) (Fuel: {'coal': 11}; Status: WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
• Burner Inserter at (-10.5, -46.5) (Fuel: {'coal': 4}; Status: WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS; Warnings: ["out of fuel"])

Consists of:
• WoodenChest at (-19.5, -54.5)

• Stone Furnace at (5.0, 0.0) (Fuel: {'coal': 1}; Furnace Result: {'copper-plate': 5}; Status: NO_INGREDIENTS; Warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"])

• Burner Inserter at (1.5, 0.5) (Status: NO_FUEL; Warnings: ["out of fuel"])

• Chest at (0.5, 2.5)

### Research Laboratory
Consists of:
• Lab with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 12} (Electrical ID updated to 19039; Status: NO_RESEARCH_IN_PROGRESS)

### Pipeline Network (Infrastructure)
Consists of the following pipe groups:
• PipeGroup (fluid_system=79634) at (14.5, 7.5) (Status: EMPTY)
• PipeGroup (fluid_system=79642) at (3.5, 15.5) (Status: EMPTY)
• PipeGroup (fluid_system=79645) at (0.5, 18.5) (Status: EMPTY)
• PipeGroup (fluid_system=79646, fluid=water) at (6.5, 19.5) (Status: FULL_OUTPUT)
• PipeGroup (fluid_system=79650) at (-4.5, 20.5) (Status: EMPTY)
• PipeGroup (fluid_system=79660, fluid=water) at (7.5, 25.5) (Status: FULL_OUTPUT)

### Transport Belt Network (Infrastructure)
Consists of the following elements:
• BeltGroup with input Belt at (-13.5, -49.5) and output Belt at (3.5, -2.5) (Contains 73 belts)
• BeltGroup with input Belt at (-11.5, -47.5) and output Belt at (-9.5, -46.5) (Contains 4 belts)
• BeltGroup with inputs from belts at (-11.5, -44.5), (-5.5, -24.5), (-6.5, -1.5) and outputs at (1.5, -1.5) and (1.5, -2.5) (Contains 97 belts)
• BeltGroup with input Belt at (-14.5, -24.5) and output Belt at (-6.5, -25.5) (Contains 10 belts)
• BeltGroup with input Belt at (-14.5, -25.5) and output Belt at (-7.5, -26.5) (Contains 9 belts)
• Standalone Belt at (1.5, -0.5) with direction DOWN

### Electricity Distribution Network (Infrastructure)
Consists of:
• ElectricityGroup (id=19039) with Voltage: 33 (Contains poles at positions such as (8.5, 5.5), (8.5, 7.5), (3.5, 5.5), (14.5, 10.5), (9.5, 15.5), (7.5, 5.5) among others)

### Offshore Water Pumping System
Consists of:
• Offshore Pump at (0.5, 30.5) (Status: WORKING)
• Offshore Pump at (1.5, 32.5) (Status: WORKING)

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• WoodenChest Placement in Obstructed Zones  
 – Clear candidate tiles manually before attempting placement to avoid repetitive obstruction errors.
• Redundant Placement Attempts  
 – Verify the existence of a structure before initiating a placement action.
• Inconsistent Candidate Zone Selection  
 – Refine detection logic to differentiate critical structures from removable clutter.
• Incorrect Invocation of Position Object  
 – Access properties of Position directly instead of calling them as functions.
• Inventory Constructor Usage Error  
 – Pass only the defined parameters to Inventory.__init__() for proper instantiation.
• Fuel Insufficiency for Burner-based Entities  
 – Ensure burner mining drills, inserters, and furnaces receive adequate fuel.
• Power Network Connection Issues  
 – Confirm steam engines are properly connected to the power network and that sufficient input liquid is supplied.
• Furnace Ingredient Deficiency  
 – Supply necessary raw materials to furnaces to avoid “no ingredients to smelt” warnings.
• Risky Automated Clearance Operations  
 – Verify the significance of nearby entities before automated removal.
• Inconsistent Execution Log References  
 – Maintain sequential and accurate step numbering in execution logs.
• Repetitive Log Summaries  
 – Print each execution log only once to avoid duplication.
• Entity Data Formatting Issues  
 – Ensure proper formatting of entity neighbor and position data.
• Stale Entity Data Reference  
 – Update entity data references promptly to avoid reliance on outdated information.

NAMESPACE
────────────────────────────
get_connection_amount(boiler: Entity, extra_se: Entity, connection_type: Prototype) -> int  
 – Determines the required number of pipes to connect two entities; raises an exception if connectivity or spatial conditions are not met.

place_entity(entity_type: Prototype, position: Position, direction: Direction) -> Entity  
 – Attempts to place an entity at a specified position and orientation; fails if the tile is occupied or necessary items are missing in inventory.

craft_item(item: Prototype, quantity: int) -> int  
 – Initiates crafting for a specified item and quantity; throws an exception if essential ingredients or an operational production facility is missing.

get_entity(entity_name: str, position: Position) -> Entity  
 – Retrieves an entity from the map at the given position that matches the specified name; used to verify placement outcomes.

Important Variables:
• inventory: dict[str, int] — Represents the current inventory.
• boiler: Entity — Refers to the boiler at (8.0, 20.5).
• extra_se: Entity — Denotes the extra steam engine at (11.5, 18.5).
• new_buildable_area: BuildableArea — Utility used to determine available buildable regions.
